results.title: Deep threat = Mer mere
results.creator_credit: Wolf Koenig, ONF | NFB and Don Arioli
results.brief_description: Humour helps bring home a serious point in this animated, wordless film. The sea has its own laws and man is accountable to them. Man is shown evolving from the sea, then developing industry and the wastes that pollute that same sea. (Awards: Toulon, San Antonio)

results.title: Deep shit
results.creator_credit: Victorian College of the Arts, School of Film and Television and Morgan Evans
results.brief_description: When Mr Sideburns (Morgan Evans) stumbles across a security camera tape from the casino which incriminates the Premier, he finds a variety of sources are eager to lay hands on the material. With a casual nod to the Hong Kong action genre, Deep Shit’s momentum carries the viewer through such recognisable Melbourne locales as Parliament Station, Melbourne Central and Queen Victoria Market.

results.title: Deep sea trawler
results.brief_description: Part of the “Man and his world” series, this film describes a trawler’s voyage from its home port on the North Sea to the Grand Banks off Newfoundland. Shows the complete operation of catching and processing the fish.

results.title: Deep sea drilling project
results.creator_credit: National Science Foundation and Jack Robinson
results.brief_description: Shows how ocean bottom cores are obtained and what they tell about the drifting of continents throughout the ages. Documents the voyages of the Clomar Challenger, a new class of drilling ship able to probe deep beneath the floors of the oceans.

results.title: Deep sea dive
results.brief_description: Explore the last great frontier on earth - under the sea. Join Spin, an animated globe-on-the-go (voice provided by Dudley Moore), as he explores the world’s ocean from surface to seafloor. Learn about the great whales, friendly dolphins, scary sharks, and all the oceans’ amazing treasures. Brilliant cinematography and magical music videos make this undersea world of wonders come alive. Suitable for Lower-Middle Primary level students.

results.title: Deep red
results.creator_credit: Rizzoli Film, Salvatore Argento, Spettacoli and Dario Argento
results.brief_description: Dario Argento’s blood thirsty thriller stars British actor David Hemmings. Witnessing the violent murder of a young parapsychologist, Hemmings embarks on a search for the murderer by following the trail of blood and destruction. “Deep red” is a film of relentless tension, with a bizarre ending and contains some of cinema’s most gripping film sequences. Italian dialogue. Dubbed in English.

results.title: Deep in my heart
results.creator_credit: Roger Edens, Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer and Stanley Donen
results.brief_description: This film ‘biopic’ portrays the life of composer Sigmund Romberg, whose scores included “The Desert Song” and “Maytime”. While Broadway swings to the jazzy beat of ragtime, Romberg chooses to play the beautiful waltzes of his native country. When Romberg is convinced by the owner of the Cafe Vienna to try his hand at ragtime he writes a hit song in no time at all. Romberg writes one smash hit after another and eventually creates a hit show that takes Broadway by storm. Based on the book by Elliot Arnold. Stars Jose Ferrer, Merle Oberon, Helen Traubel, Walter Pidgeon with special guest appearances by Ann Miller, Rosemary Clooney, Cyd Charisse, Gene Kelly and Howard Keel.

results.title: Deep hearts
results.creator_credit: Robert Gardner and Harvard University. Film Study Center
results.brief_description: About the Bororo Fulani of the Niger Republic in Africa. The Bororo are a nomadic tribe, moving with their cattle across the Sahel desert each year to gather in large numbers at certain watering places to celebrate their vision of themselves as chosen beings and to enjoy one another’s company. Dressed in ceremonial attire, they celebrate the yearly rains by singing and dancing.

results.title: Deep fat frying
results.brief_description: Presents basic information on deep fat frying, stressing the equipment to be used, the prevention of fat absorption, and the care of fats to prevent decomposition. Shows how to get the highest quality and dollar savings from this cooking method.
